project_address: MERLIN ORION, NEAR SHREYAS FLYOVER DHARNIDHAR, PALDI
promoterAddress: 904 INDRAPRASTH CORPORATE ANAND NAGAR ROAD PRAHLADNAGAR Ahmedabad 380015

formThreeBId.notesToCertificate:
The project is following the redevelopment model. In certificate dated 18/04/2018 which reflected the status as on 29/03/2018, the cost of gift money, rent and outright purchase of three units which were ought to be reported under para [f(iii)] of Land Cost, was reported under para [a] of Land Cost. The same was correctly reported under para [f(iii)] in reports dated 20/09/2018, 18/12/2018, 22/03/2019, 02/08/2019, 02/10/2019, 31/12/2019, 13/09/2020, 22/09/2020, 07/01/2021, 07/04/2021, 07/07/2021, 02/11/2021, 06/01/2022 and 07/04/2022. This report also follows the same approach and classification. This is also to bring to your notice that it has no impact on total reported amount and therefore the withdrawal limit remains the same and consistent as per RERA Law, Rules and Regulations.

Proportion of the cost incurred to the estimated cost comes to 100%. However, the same is reflected at 84.79 % due to the fact that the estimated cost incurred is obtained from Form-2 and it is not having segregation of cost as per requirements of redevelopment projects.
